Moves.Name: Taunt
Moves.Description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

Moves.Name: Uproar
Moves.Description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. During that time, no Pokémon can fall asleep.

Moves.Name: Flatter
Moves.Description: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also boosts the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Abilities.Name: Scrappy
Abilities.Description: The user can hit Ghost-type Pokemon with Normal-type and Fighting-type moves, the user also becomes unaffected by Intimidate.

Abilities.Name: Tangled Feet
Abilities.Description: Increases the user's Evasion by one stage when it gets Confused.

Abilities.Name: Costar
Abilities.Description: The Pokemon copies an ally's stat changes when it enters the field.

Moves.Name: Mega Kick
Moves.Description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle- packed power.

Moves.Name: Aerial Ace
Moves.Description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

Moves.Name: Air Slash
Moves.Description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Payback
Moves.Description: The user stores power, then attacks. This move's power is doubled if the user moves after the target.

Moves.Name: Taunt
Moves.Description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

Abilities.Name: Unburden
Abilities.Description: Doubles the user's Speed once it uses its Held item.

Abilities.Name: Poison Touch
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to poison opponents that the user attacks and makes direct contact with.

Abilities.Name: Prankster
Abilities.Description: Increases the Speed priority of status moves by 1. Moves affected by this ability are ineffective against Dark-type opponents.

Moves.Name: Poison Jab
Moves.Description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, an arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

Moves.Name: Slash
Moves.Description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws, scythes, or the like. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Moves.Name: Taunt
Moves.Description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

Moves.Name: Flatter
Moves.Description: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also boosts the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Moves.Name: Toxic
Moves.Description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

Abilities.Name: Well-Baked Body
Abilities.Description: The Pokemon takes no damage from Fire-type moves, and its Defense stat is raised by two stages if hit by a Fire-type attack.

Abilities.Name: Aroma Veil
Abilities.Description: Protects the user and allies from attacks that would limit their move choices.

Moves.Name: Play Rough
Moves.Description: The user attacks by playing rough with the target. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

Moves.Name: Take Down
Moves.Description: A reckless full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

Moves.Name: Charm
Moves.Description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers the target's Attack stat.

Moves.Name: Bite
Moves.Description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

Abilities.Name: Mycelium Might
Abilities.Description: All status moves used by the Pokemon have decreased priority, and will ignore the Ability of the target.

Moves.Name: Earth Power
Moves.Description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Moves.Name: Seed Bomb
Moves.Description: The user attacks by slamming a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

Moves.Name: Stun Spore
Moves.Description: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

Moves.Name: Foul Play
Moves.Description: The user turns the target's strength against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the damage this move inflicts.

Moves.Name: Growth
Moves.Description: The user's body grows all at once, boosting the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

Abilities.Name: Poison Point
Abilities.Description: Has a 30% chance to poison attackers that make direct contact with the user.

Abilities.Name: Water Absorb
Abilities.Description: The user restores up to 25% of its max HP instead of taking damage when hit with Water-type moves.

Abilities.Name: Unaware
Abilities.Description: The user ignores the opponent's stat changes when attacking.

Moves.Name: Poison Jab
Moves.Description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle, an arm, or the like steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

Moves.Name: Stomping Tantrum
Moves.Description: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.

Moves.Name: Yawn
Moves.Description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

Moves.Name: Toxic
Moves.Description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

Moves.Name: Stockpile
Moves.Description: The user stores power and boosts its Defense and Sp. Def stats. This move can be used up to three times.
